Question: Still, this person never returned to Three Rivers Stadium for a Steelers game.
Hints: Politically, this person is a long-time supporter of the Republican Party.
In 2006, this person returned to the silver screen in the motion picture Failure to Launch.
In his 14-season career, this person completed 2,025 of 3,901 passes for 27,989 yards and 212 touchdowns.
